title: Of free justification by Christ written first in Latine by John Fox, author of the Book of martyrs, against Osorius, &c. and now translated into English, for the benefit of those who love their own souls, and would not be mistaken in so great a point.
author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587.
notes: Translation of De Christo gratis justificante.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
